MDW The Grand/Cicero North elevator
The Grand/Cicero North elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/NCS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
NCS 109 delayed
NCS train #109 scheduled to arrive Antioch at 6:05 PM, may be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule, due to freight train interference . Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME The 51st Street East elevator is back in service.
The 51st Street East elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/NCS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
NCS 113 on the move
NCS train #113, scheduled to arrive Antioch at 6:28 PM, is on the move, and maybe operating 25 to 35 minutes behind schedule due to switch problems
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN 2143/2145 Combo Train

MDN trains 2143 and 2145 will operate as a combo train scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:52pm. This train will make all stops to Fox Lake. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Track Construction Saturday, January 31 through Sunday, February 1

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 31 through Sunday, February 1. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 30 minutes behind scheduled passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN Trains Delayed
MDN inbound and outbound trains may be operating up to 45 minutes behind schedule due to earlier signal problems. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1

Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.

MDN 2139 - Will Not Operate

MDN train #2139, scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:13 PM, will not operate due to signal problems. Train #2143, scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:43 PM will accommodate passengers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The Van Buren Platform Elevator
The Van Buren Platform elevator is back in service. (Updated 12:04PM)

MED 79th, 87th, 103rd St. Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW Inbound and Outbound Delayed (Update 2)
MDW inbound and outbound trains may be operating up to 35 minutes behind schedule due to freight train interference. Please visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train. (Updated 5:50 PM)
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
